textAfterTable: Siliguri (West Bengal) to Guwahati (Assam) is 437 km. Time by road is 6 hrs, 40 mins. 437 Siliguri to Guwahati Trains - Close this Dhupguri (DQG), Bhagalpur (BGP), Malda Town (MLDT), Kishanganj (KNE), New Jalpaiguri (NJP) and Katihar Jn (KIR) are 6 nearby train stations connected to Guwahati.
